means: 传授的或获得的知识，课程

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"命令"之意。
means: command ： 较正式用词，强调权威性、全局性和强制性。
order ： 普通用词，侧重指具体的命令。
direction ： 正式用词，指口头或书面的指示或命令。内容不一定详尽，语气较缓和，不太强调强制性。也可指指导性的说明。
instruction ： 书面用词，指不容违反、不容推翻的命令。也多指包含具体说明的指示。

sentence.Network_en: This technique brings life to instruction and eases assimilation of knowledge.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一方法给教学带来了活力，也使知识的吸收变得容易了。

sentence.Network_en: The worst part of the set-up is the poor instruction manual.
sentence.Network_cn: 安装时最糟糕就是操作指南讲述不够清楚。

sentence.Network_en: The students generously gave them instruction in social responsibility.
sentence.Network_cn: 学生们不厌其烦地为他们讲解什么是社会责任。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from late Latin instructio(n-), from the verb instruere (see instruct)

encyclopedia.content: 字典解释 动词：instruct 讲授， 教导[育]; 教诲 [pl. ]指令[示]; 命令； 通知， 程序， 说明书， 细则， 规程 The doctor's instructions must be fulfilled exactly. 医生的指示必须严格遵行。 The boss gave me so many instructions at one time that I got muddled up. "老板一下子给了我那么多指示，把我弄得糊里糊涂。" （常用复数instructions ）说明 Read the instructions on the pocket. 看一下袋子上的说明

entry.def: An instruction is something that someone tells you to do.

example.ex: Two lawyers were told not to leave the building but no reason for this instruction was given.
example.tran: 两名律师被告知不得离开大楼,但对这一命令并没有提供任何理由。

entry.def: If someone gives you instruction in a subject or skill, they teach it to you.

example.ex: Each candidate is given instruction in safety...
example.tran: 向每位申请人都讲授了安全知识。

example.ex: All schoolchildren must now receive some religious instruction.
example.tran: 现在所有的在校儿童都必须接受一定的宗教教育。

entry.def: Instructions are clear and detailed information on how to do something.

example.ex: Always read the instructions before you start taking the medicine.
example.tran: 在服药之前一定要先阅读说明书。

means.word_mean: 1. a message describing how something is to be done;

sentences.sentence: "he gave directions faster than she could follow them"

means.word_mean: 2. the activities of educating or instructing or teaching; activities that impart knowledge or skill;

sentences.sentence: "he prepared for teaching while still in college"
"pedagogy is recognized as an important profession"

means.word_mean: 4. (computer science) a line of code written as part of a computer program

auth_sentence.content: One might call such instruction the gesundheit of reason.

auth_sentence.content: By way of instruction, Yeng eats one first.
auth_sentence.res_content: By way of instruction, Yeng eats one first.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: By way of instruction, Yeng eats one first.

destruct破坏+ive……的→adj.破坏性
industry工业, 产业+ial……的→industrial
industry勤奋+ious..的→industrious

obstruct[v.阻隔,阻塞[道路,通道等]n.阻碍物,障碍物]+ion表名词→n.妨碍,障碍物

de去掉,变坏+struct建立,结构→adj.破坏的 n.故意或有计划的破坏 v.破坏
destruct破坏+ion表名词→弄坏结构→破坏

stems_affixes.value_cn: 工业, 产业, 行业, 勤奋
stems_affixes.word_buile: indu=in+str=struct建立,结构+y→n.工业, 产业, 行业, 勤奋
instruct[v.教,教授;命令,指示]+ion表名词→n.教授;指导;[n.]用法说明[书],操作指南
instruct[v.教,教授;命令,指示]+or人→n.指导者,教员
in内+stru=struct建立,结构+ment物→内部构造→仪器,工具
instrumental[adj.仪器的;器械的;乐器的;起作用的;有帮助的]+ity性质→n.手段
ob反+struct建立,结构→反建设→阻塞,阻碍
struct建立,结构+ure表名词→n.结构,构造;建筑物 v.构造,建造

stems_affixes.value_cn: 基础,下部结构,地下建筑

super上面+structure结构→上面的结构→上层建筑

de去掉,变坏+struct建立,结构→adj.破坏的 n.故意或有计划的破坏 v.破坏

ob反+struct建立,结构→反建设→阻塞,阻碍
re再+construct[v.建设,建造,构造;创立]→v.重建,再建;重现,再现
struct建立,结构+ure表名词→n.结构,构造;建筑物 v.构造,建造

Sentence.sentence: But I think if we follow these instructions exactly, we won't have much trouble.
Giving students detailed guidance and instruction.

Some states require parents or a home tutor to meet teacher certification standards, and many require parents to complete legal forms to verify that their children are receiving instruction in state approved curriculum.

sentences.en: They had received instructions to watch him.
sentences.cn: 他们收到了监视他的命令。

means.word_mean: 讲授, 指导, 教学

sentences.en: I anticipate deriving much instruction from the lecture.
sentences.cn: 我期望从这演讲中获得很多教益。

means.word_mean: 使用说明书, 操作指南

sentences.en: The instructions for assembling the toy are very clear.
sentences.cn: 如何装配玩具的说明非常清楚明了。

jushi.english: We did it on the instructions of the leadership.
jushi.chinese: 我们根据领导的指示这样做的。

jushi.english: The expert gives their regular instruction in physics.
jushi.chinese: 专家定期给他们讲授物理。

jushi.english: He has given instructions for the books to be sent at once.
jushi.chinese: 他已经发出指令：立即把书送去。
